articles.author: Catherine Bosley, Winnie Hsu
articles.title: Japanese Stocks Plummet on Rate Hike Worries: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: Equities in China and Hong Kong were standout gainers on Monday after Beijing’s latest measures to tackle its property crisis, while European markets were set for an uninspiring start to the week after German and Italian automakers issued a downbeat outlook.
